value:
$WmMPID_エフィ,ch10_06_Efi_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Alm! Oh, I'm so glad you're safe.
You're not hurt, are you?$k$p$WmMPID_アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_Normal,Face|$w0|No, I'm fine. But what was that?
Some sort of earthquake?$k$p$WmMPID_クレア,ch10_03_Crea_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I have no idea. From the sky, it
looked like the whole continent
was splitting in two...$k$pIt looked like the end of the world.$k$p$WmMPID_アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Let's search for everyone else.
They're probably worried.$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|$w0|To worry for your friends even
in such a desperate situation...
You are the ray of hope I seek.$k$p$WmMPID_アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Huh?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|$w0|You are Alm, another Hero-King
and wielder of the Falchion,
are you not?$k$p$WmMPID_アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_Normal,Face|$w0|And you are?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|$w0|Marth...
My name is Marth.$k$pHeed my words, Heroes from the
World of Shadows. The calamity
that split your world...$k$pwas caused by the Tempest.
If you lend me your strength,
we can restore your land.$k$p

$WmMPID_アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_Normal,Face|$w0|The Tempest seems to be
getting weaker.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|$w0|Your Falchion cut through
its chaos.$k$pHowever, we are only half-done.
Your world's gods have given
Valentia two faces.$k$pI must seek her out...the other
Hero. Your counterpart.$k$p$WmMPID_アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You mean...her?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|$w0|The Celica we just fought is from
another world. You could consider
her just one possibility...$k$pNow that she's free from the
Tempest, she should be back to
normal and in her own world.$k$pHowever, the Celica of legend—
the Celica you know—is fighting
the Tempest as we speak.$k$pI must go to her aid.$k$p$WmMPID_アルム,ch10_00_Arum_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Wait! Celica is my friend. Ever
since we were children...$k$pProtecting her is my responsibility.
I'm coming with you.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|$w0|Hmm... It is said that the Falchion
is a blade forged from the fang
of a divine dragon.$k$pSo together we possess two
fangs... That's surely enough
to cleave the Tempest's chaos.$k$pLet us go.$k$p
